TopicTitle: Allow Editing of Ships With Missing Parts

Articles.Content:
Title says it all.

Sometimes I want to change ship designs that contain missing parts and sometimes I want to terminate the ships in space that have missing parts but are hidden by ksp.
What would happen if a missing part is connecting two sections of the ship?

Missing parts could be replaced by a generic placeholder part that does not have any function and only acts as a structural element with as many attach points as used in the .craft file. Its model could be a bright pink sphere, for instance.

It is possible to implement and it would make some people happy. When someone has a problem and sends me his .craft file to troubleshoot, I'm out of luck unless I install all mods he used for the ship, which usually means I give up. But it's hard to tell if devs will find it worth the trouble implementing it.

Another reason is because I occasionally experience a bug where my mods disappear.

Usually just get all the mods again, but updated versions sometimes remove certain parts.
